search.query: | tstats `cs_summariesonly_network_traffic` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic where [| search `cs_qualys_vuln` IP IN ("*") `cs_qualys_timerange` STATUS="ACTIVE" PORT=* | stats count by IP PORT | eval field = "(All_Traffic.dest_ip = \"".IP."\" AND All_Traffic.dest_port = \"".PORT."\")" | appendpipe [| stats count | where count==0 | eval field="false()" | fields field] | fields field | return 10000 $field ] by All_Traffic.src_ip All_Traffic.dest_ip All_Traffic.dest_port | `drop_dm_object_name(All_Traffic)` | rename dest_ip as vul_ip, dest_port as vul_port, count as inbound_traffic | append [| tstats `cs_summariesonly_network_traffic` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic where [| search `cs_qualys_vuln` IP IN ("*") `cs_qualys_timerange` STATUS="ACTIVE" PORT=* | stats count by IP PORT | eval field = "(All_Traffic.src_ip = \"".IP."\" AND All_Traffic.src_port = \"".PORT."\")" | appendpipe [| stats count | where count==0 | eval field="false()" | fields field] | fields field | return 10000 $field ] by All_Traffic.dest_ip All_Traffic.src_ip All_Traffic.src_port | `drop_dm_object_name(All_Traffic)` | rename src_ip as vul_ip, src_port as vul_port, count as outbound_traffic] | iplocation src_ip | ` cs_network_generate_location_for_internal_network(src_ip)` | iplocation dest_ip | ` cs_network_generate_location_for_internal_network(dest_ip)` | table vul_ip, vul_port, src_ip, inbound_traffic, dest_ip, outbound_traffic, Country, Region, City

html.p: Data Collection: Qualys data is necessary to collect vulnerability scan results and host summaries. This data can be acquired via the Qualys Technology Add-on (TA) for Splunk.
Currently, the Cyences app searches through the last seven days of Qualys related data.

search.query: `cs_qualys` `cs_qualys_timerange` | stats count, latest(_time) as "Last Scan" | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present"), label="`cs_qualys`" | eval "Last Scan"=if(count=0, " - ", strftime('Last Scan', "%F %T")) | table label, "Last Scan", data

`cs_qualys_hostsummary` `cs_qualys_timerange` | dedup HOST_ID | search $tkn_ip$ | fields HOST_ID, DNS, IP, NETWORK_ID, OS, TRACKING_METHOD, TOTAL_VULNS, ACTIVE*, NEW*, CONFIRMED*, POTENTIAL*, RE_OPENED*, FIXED*, INFO*, SEVERITY_*, LAST_* | table IP, OS, TOTAL_VULNS, ACTIVE, ACTIVE_SEVERITY_5, ACTIVE_SEVERITY_4, NEW, CONFIRMED, POTENTIAL, RE_OPENED, FIXED, INFO, LAST_*, HOST_ID, DNS, NETWORK_ID, TRACKING_METHOD | sort -ACTIVE

html.p: Expand each row to view all vulnerabilities related to a specific host.

search.query: | stats sum(inbound_traffic) as inbound_traffic, sum(outbound_traffic) as outbound_traffic by vul_ip, vul_port | sort - inbound_traffic, - outbound_traffic
